review: Great for Youtube and Netflix - does NOT have a power button, so it's constantly on.
author: TheBaldEagle

review: The future of TV. User friendly. IF you want to move to the future this is it.
author: Kelvin Abram

review: I would give this device LESS than one star!!  IF you want to cast tabs from your Chrome browser on any device, be prepared for the Chromecast to STOP and shut down within 2 minutes (many instances sooner).  Searching the web for a fix found COUNTLESS complaints just like mine.  Waste of $30.  Will probably have to go to Apple TV.Too many headaches...might be OK once the Chromecast software gets out of Beta...
author: Frank Gonzales

review: Not bad, but it could be better. Some apps doesn't work 100%
author: Alberto Contreras
